owl:Ontology.terms:description: Esta ontología has sido diseñada para representar Instrumentos de captura de datos clínicos, dentro del contexto del proyecto MedRed (https://www.hevs.ch/en/rad-institutes/institute-of-information-systems/projects/medical-research-data-acquisition-platform-14092)
owl:Ontology.terms:rights: Copyright © 2017 Politecnico di Milano & HES-SO Valais-Wallis
owl:Ontology.terms:title: VOIS2 ontology: A model for data streams and metadata
owl:Ontology.terms:description: This ontology aims to model generic Medical Data Acquisition Instruments, which can be interoperable across different clinical data management systems. The ontology is developed in the context of the MedRed project (https://www.hevs.ch/en/rad-institutes/institute-of-information-systems/projects/medical-research-data-acquisition-platform-14092)
owl:Ontology.terms:title: Ontología VOIS2: modelo de representación de data y metadata de streams
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Esta ontología has sido diseñada para representar Instrumentos de captura de datos clínicos, dentro del contexto del proyecto MedRed (https://www.hevs.ch/en/rad-institutes/institute-of-information-systems/projects/medical-research-data-acquisition-platform-14092)

This ontology aims to model generic Medical Data Acquisition Instruments, which can be interoperable across different clinical data management systems. The ontology is developed in the context of the MedRed project (https://www.hevs.ch/en/rad-institutes/institute-of-information-systems/projects/medical-research-data-acquisition-platform-14092)
owl:Ontology.terms:title: Ontologie VOIS2: modèle de representation de données et metadonnées de streams
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Cette ontologie a été conçue pour representer des Instruments pour l'aquisition de données cliniques, dans le contexte du projet MedRed project (https://www.hevs.ch/en/rad-institutes/institute-of-information-systems/projects/medical-research-data-acquisition-platform-14092)
owl:Ontology.terms:description: Cette ontologie a été conçue pour representer des Instruments pour l'aquisition de données cliniques, dans le contexte du projet MedRed project (https://www.hevs.ch/en/rad-institutes/institute-of-information-systems/projects/medical-research-data-acquisition-platform-14092)

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a Stream and a StreamEndpoint. A stream may have several endpoints through which its contents can be accessible.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasEndpoint

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a Stream and a partition, or portion of elements streamed
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasPartition

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a stream partition and the previoous partition in the stream
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: previous

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A stream composed of RDF data elements, i.e. RDF graphs and/or triples.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RDFStream

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A potentially infinite sequence of data elements. A stream may be findable and accesible on the Web.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stream

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Stream Descriptor is a Web document that contains the description of a Stream.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: StreamDescriptor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents a specific available form of a stream. Each stream might be available in different forms, these forms might represent different access points of the stream. Examples of distributions include a WebSocket endpoint, an HTTP endpint, a Server-Sent Events endpint, MQTT, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: StreamDistribution

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents a specific available form of a stream. Each stream might be available in different forms, these forms might represent different access points of the stream. Examples of endpoints include a WebSocket endpoint, an HTTP endpint, a Server-Sent Events endpint, MQTT, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: StreamEndpoint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A portion of the time-varying data items of a Stream
owl:Class.rdfs:label: StreamPartition
